channel.title: CVE Feed for Lexmark -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lexmark -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-2821|2024-08-05T14:02:07.914Z -- lexmark -- perceptive%20document%20filters
item.description: An exploitable use-after-free exists in the PDF parsing functionality of Lexmark Perspective Document Filters 11.3.0.2400 and 11.4.0.2452. A crafted PDF document can lead to a use-after-free resulting in direct code execution.

item.title: CVE-2017-2822|2024-08-05T14:09:16.367Z -- lexmark -- perceptive%20document%20filters
item.description: An exploitable code execution vulnerability exists in the image rendering functionality of Lexmark Perceptive Document Filters 11.3.0.2400. A specifically crafted PDF can cause a function call on a corrupted DCTStream to occur, resulting in user controlled data being written to the stack. A maliciously crafted PDF file can be used to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-2806|2024-08-05T14:02:07.911Z -- lexmark -- perceptive%20document%20filters
item.description: An exploitable arbitrary read exists in the XLS parsing of the Lexmark Perspective Document Filters conversion functionality. A crafted XLS document can lead to a arbitrary read resulting in memory disclosure. The vulnerability was confirmed on versions 11.3.0.2228 and 11.3.0.2400

item.title: CVE-2023-50736|2024-08-02T22:16:47.298Z -- lexmark -- various
item.description: A memory corruption vulnerability has been identified in PostScript interpreter in various Lexmark devices. The vulnerability can be leveraged by an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-50735|2024-08-02T22:16:47.271Z -- lexmark -- various
item.description: A heap corruption vulnerability has been identified in PostScript interpreter in various Lexmark devices. The vulnerability can be leveraged by an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-50734|2024-08-02T22:16:47.196Z -- lexmark -- various
item.description: A buffer overflow vulnerability has been identified in PostScript interpreter in various Lexmark devices. The vulnerability can be leveraged by an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-50737|2024-08-02T22:16:47.299Z -- lexmark -- various
item.description: The SE menu contains information used by Lexmark to diagnose device errors. A vulnerability in one of the SE menu routines can be leveraged by an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-50734|2024-02-28T01:47:47.211Z -- lexmark -- various
item.description: A buffer overflow vulnerability has been identified in PostScript interpreter in various Lexmark devices. The vulnerability can be leveraged by an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-50735|2024-02-28T02:37:26.310Z -- lexmark -- various
item.description: A heap corruption vulnerability has been identified in PostScript interpreter in various Lexmark devices. The vulnerability can be leveraged by an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-50736|2024-02-28T02:37:45.438Z -- lexmark -- various
item.description: A memory corruption vulnerability has been identified in PostScript interpreter in various Lexmark devices. The vulnerability can be leveraged by an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-50737|2024-02-28T02:38:03.334Z -- lexmark -- various
item.description: The SE menu contains information used by Lexmark to diagnose device errors. A vulnerability in one of the SE menu routines can be leveraged by an attacker to execute arbitrary code.
